e: ￹`Ma~`polong~ `kita~ `a~ `mala~`hok~.￺Let's all eat lunch together.￻我們一起吃午飯
￹`Polongen~ `ko~ `paro~ `no~ `loma'~ `a~ `ma~`sa'opo~.￺Have all the family gather together.￻讓全家人團聚
￹`O~ `ka~`polong~`an~ `a~ `sa'opo~ `konini~.￺This is a gathering for all who belong (to a group * as for example a church denomination).￻這是全體的聚合
￹`Saka~`polong~`an~ `han~ `nangra~ `ko~ `tayal~ `ato~ `dafong~.￺They shared together their work and possessions.￻我們一起工作並分享所得，他們共同工作並共有財產
